parameters.name: IpControlId
parameters.description: The ID of the ACL. The ID is unique.

parameters.name: IpControlType
parameters.description:
The type of the ACL. Valid values:

*   **ALLOW**: a whitelist
*   **REFUSE**: a blacklist

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 10.
